Anamy for Multi Activities Co.Ltd.

Anamy was established in 2018 and works in the field of various... read more

OUR VISION

To become a global leader in providing the best services.

OUR MESSAGE

The tireless pursuit of creating a stimulating environment to provide the best services, optimal employment of skills, creativity in developing solutions and building an effective local and global partnership.

OUR VALUES

Loyalty, belonging, cooperation, team spirit, creativity, respect, transparency and accountability.

OBJECTIVES

  • Quality and distinction in providing services that are not less than those of local and international companies.
  • Attracting the best employees at all job levels.
  • Investing in human capital
  • Building bridges of communication inside and outside the company
  • Building a lasting relationship with customers as one of the company's success partners.
  • Provide a stimulating work environment.
  • Diversifying sources of income and financing to achieve financial stability.
  • Flexibility in dealing with others and concluding sound performance contracts
  • Building a management model and organizational structure that supports the company's vision and achieves its goals.
